ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Krampus Winter Wonderland!
Krampus bells ring, are you listening.
Tarot is ready, her armor is glistening.
A beautiful Witch, A devil with a Switch.
Fighting in a Winter Wonderland!
Also... the time of the courting is OVER!
Raven Hex must make her decision!
Will she marry the Dragon Prince and become his Princess?
